summary: This is a simple light weight Immersion mod that allows the ash from the red mountain to fall on Dunmer settlement of Raven Rock.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Courier New][size=6]


[u]
Ashes Of The Red Mountain[/u][/size][/font][/center]
[center][size=4]

A Skyrim Mod Spotlight by Hodilton[/size]


[youtube]LqWgWZxPIGk[/youtube]


[size=4]

And an-depth detailed showcase by Nozi87

[/size]
[youtube]qmvwFKTahWg[/youtube]


[size=4][size=3][u]If you like my mod, [/u][u]Dont forget to endorse the mod and like the videos and Subscribed to their Youtube channels for awesome mods reviews[/u][/size]
[/size]





[img]http://media-cache-ec0.pinimg.com/originals/fc/3d/3a/fc3d3ade6288076f9cc112282194d775.jpg[/img]

The mod allows the ashes from the red mountain to accumulated on Dunmer settlement of Raven Rock. The ash now covers OUTDOOR Urns, crates,Â  barrels, that well, stairs and those huge walls.


USKP Patches by Fjolfrin
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60472/?]Ashes of the Red Mountain - Unofficial Patches Patches by [b]Fjolfrin[/b][/url]

[u]
[size=4]Note[/size][/u][size=4]
[/size]
As only static object can be manipulated to be covered with Snow or Ash. All the Urns in the exterior of Raven Rock are turned to static for Immersion.
And the ash is uncontrolled and mostly applied to top of the object

(I didnt make the game people, just doing what can be done) So they CANNOT be open .



[u]
[/u][size=4]
[u]Special Mention[/u][u] to Northern Maiden[/u]
[/size]


As Im also the author of the Windhelm Unchained mod, The Northern Maiden will behave in Immersive manner. The ship will be covered in Ash when its in Raven Rock and covered in Snow when its in Windhelm. I didnt make a solstheium only version coz it wont make sense to calling it Immersive but i can if you want me too just let me know in the comment section

[u][/u][u]


[/u]

If you like the mod, be sure to endorse and check out my Other (side of the) mod
